野中: (のなか) - in the middle of a field
野人: (やじん) - rustic/country bumpkin/countryfolk; ruffian/unrefined person; non-politician/non-government person/civilian; Yeren/legendary mountain-dwelling hominid (similar to a sasquatch, yeti, etc.) of China's Hubei province
野伏: (のぶし) - hermit/mountain ascetic/itinerant priest; mountain-dwelling robber/brigand

野党: (yatou) - partido de oposição, oposição política, oposição
野党指導者: (やとうしどうしゃ) - opposition leader
野分: (のわき) - late autumn (fall) windstorm in the countryside/typhoon, esp. one that blows from the 210th to the 220th day of the year; name of the 28th roll of the Genji monogatari

野宿: (のじゅく) - sleeping outdoors; sleeping out in the open air; camping

野放途: (のほうず) - unregulated; unruly; wild; unbridled
